content: 26/18 sts rnds 30-31 k9 p2 k1 tbl p1 k1 tbl p2 k9 p1 k8 p1 k8 p1 round 32 k9 m1l p2 k1 tbl p1 k1 tbl p2 m1r k9 p1 k6 k2tog p1 ssk k6 p1 28/16 sts rnds 33-34 k10 p2 k1 tbl p1 k1 tbl p2 k10 p1 k7 p1 k7 p1 round 35 k9 m1l k1 p2 k1 tbl p1 k1 tbl p2 k1 m1r k9 p1 k5 k2tog p1 ssk k5 p1 30/14 sts rnds 36-37 k11 p2 k1 tbl p1 k1 tbl p2 k11 p1 k6 p1 k6 p1 round 38 k9 m1l k2 p2 k1 tbl p1 k1 tbl p2 k2 m1r k9 p1 k4 k2tog p1 ssk k4 p1 32/12 sts rnds 39-40 k9 p1 k2 p2 k1 tbl p1 k1 tbl p2 k2 p1 k9 p1 k5 p1 k5 p1 heel row restart at 1 in this section setup k9 then put the 13 gusset sts on a holder and turn to ws row 1 ws p9 k1 p5 k1 p5 k1 p9 turn to rs 31 sts for the remainder of the heel all ws row are worked in pattern knit the knits purl the purls row 2 rs k9 p1 k3 k2tog p1 ssk k3 p1 k9 turn to ws 29 sts row 4 k9 p1 k2 k2tog p1 ssk k2 p1 k9 turn to ws 27 sts row 6 k9 p1 k1 k2tog p1 ssk k1 p1 k9 turn to ws 25 sts row 8 k9 p1 k2tog p1 ssk p1 k9 turn to ws 23 sts row 10 k9 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k9 turn to ws 21 sts row 12 k9 p1 ssk stop 20 sts work a 3-needle bindoff over the 20 sts that remain on the active needle 1 st remains this will be the last stitch in the round as you work the cuff cuff toes and finishing please refer to the main pattern for instructions on these sections 6
